extension.summary: Record from IPTV Simple Client or xmltv/m3u with ffmpeg.
extension.description: Set your recording path and ffmpeg location. On Android ffmpeg will be copied to /data/data to be runnable. Complex stream handling might need an extra script instead of ffmpeg. ffmpeg simply copies the stream into a transport stream container.
extension.disclaimer: Make sure recording streams is legal in your country.
extension.news: 1. replace perl recorder file based mechanism to python socket based on xmltv version 1.2.0) 2. Moved 'undefined' category to end of category list 3. removed EPG context recording (stay with only from player option)
